column5: We started out at 8 am and got limit by 9 :30-----minus -17 this morning and drove to the spot mark with x.....fish were everywhere and my daughters first whitefish with one arm as surgery with pins didn't alow her to reel in --so I told her to back up until the fish come to the top and I then scooped it out for her. Ice conditions were the best I've seen in years this late---However Saturday and Sunday ---you might get out BUT NOT IN....  Good luck everyone and stay safe  SIMCOEBOB
Another great report from you BOB    Congratulations Leechman
some nice looking fish there Bob (and daughter)
Great report, Bob. I can't for the life of me imagine how you'll manage without the ice fishing on the Great Barrier Reef! I guess you'll manage....my brother has.
